name: Ode to Mathematics
description: A tribute to the abstract beauty of mathematics, this sculpture symbolizes the infinite nature of mathematical discovery.
alt: A metallic spiral structure with numbers engraved, symbolizing the infinity of mathematics.

name: Essence of Physics
description: This sculpture honors the field of physics, depicting interwoven rings that represent the fundamental forces of nature.
alt: A bronze sculpture with interwoven rings, symbolizing gravitational and magnetic fields.

name: The Heart of Medicine
description: A detailed homage to the medical field, showcasing hands cradling a human heart to represent compassion and care.
alt: Bronze hands gently holding a heart, symbolizing the compassion in medicine.

name: Legacy of Engineering
description: Celebrating engineering, this sculpture of gears and levers represents the ingenuity behind technological advancements.
alt: A bronze sculpture with gears and levers, symbolizing engineering innovations.

name: Spirit of Literature
description: A tribute to the world of literature, featuring an open book with words flowing out, symbolizing the endless imagination in storytelling.
alt: An open bronze book with words flowing outward, representing literature's influence.

name: Harmony in Chemistry
description: This piece represents the intricate bonds in chemistry, showcasing molecules connected in harmonious forms.
alt: A bronze sculpture of interconnected molecular structures, symbolizing the bonds in chemistry.
